nodes.text: The Grakkt was a native of marshes and deep swamps on the planet of Naboo. It could grow to about three meters long. The Grakkt roamed the damp grounds of the planet, with a body like a lion with armor, a crocodile-like head and a tail with spikes. Its bite delivered a dangerous venom through its saliva, which, if it was not treated as soon as possible, was fatal.
